question: Which Indian has been conferred with the Top 20 Global Women of Excellence Award for 2020 by the US Congress?
explanation:
Lt. Governor of Puducherry Tamilisai Soundararajan was presented the Top 20 Global Women of Excellence Award for 2020, instituted by the US Congressional Multi Advisory Task Force led by Congressman Danny K. Davis.
She joined the group of achievers across the world chosen for the award, including US Vice President Kamala Harris.
